entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning this evening then changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
